title: PRIVACY POLICY
description: Privacy policy and personal data protection of Dr. Serge Tunitski Clinic

introduction.title: INTRODUCTION
introduction.content: Dr. Serge Tunitski Medical Clinic (hereinafter — 'we', 'our', 'Clinic') is committed to protecting the confidentiality and security of personal data of our patients and website visitors.
introduction.regulations: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, process, and protect your information in accordance with:
introduction.agreement: By using our website and services, you agree to the terms of this Policy.

direct.title: Data you provide directly:
direct.item1: Personal data: first name, last name, ID, contact information (phone, email, address)
direct.item2: Medical information: medical history, symptoms, diagnoses, examination results, medical images
direct.item3: Demographic data: age, gender, marital status
direct.item4: Financial data: payment information (when making payments)

automatic.title: Data collected automatically:
automatic.item1: Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system, device information
automatic.item2: Usage data: page views, visit time, on-site activity history
automatic.item3: Cookies and similar technologies (see section 5 for details)

thirdParty.title: Data from third parties:
thirdParty.item1: Information from other medical institutions (upon your request)

purposes.title: Main processing purposes:
purposes.content: We use your data to provide medical services and treatment, maintain medical records, schedule appointments and manage schedules, communicate with patients about treatment, improve quality of medical services, marketing communications (with your consent), and fulfill legal obligations.

medical.title: Processing of medical data:
medical.content: Specially protected medical data is processed based on:

internal.title: Internal sharing:
internal.content: Your data may be shared among Dr. Serge Tunitski Clinic staff exclusively for medical purposes and to the extent necessary to provide services.

external.title: External recipients:
external.content: We may share data with the following categories of recipients:
external.category1: Medical specialists: consultants, laboratories, diagnostic centers
external.category2: Technical providers: hosting providers, IT support

international.title: International transfers:
international.content: Data is primarily stored in Israel. When transferring to third countries, we ensure protection through adequate EU decisions, standard contractual clauses, and certified protection mechanisms.

communication.title: Communication and messenger services:
communication.whatsapp: WhatsApp Business (Meta Platforms, Inc.) - online consultations and appointment booking
communication.messenger: Facebook Messenger (Meta Platforms, Inc.) - customer service

socialMedia.title: Social media and platforms:
socialMedia.facebook: Facebook (Meta Platforms, Inc.) - marketing and patient acquisition
socialMedia.reddit: Reddit (Reddit Inc.) - participation in medical communities

analytics.title: Analytics services:
analytics.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics (Google LLC) - web analytics and statistics
analytics.hotjar: Hotjar (Hotjar Ltd) - heat maps and interaction analysis
analytics.adobe: Adobe Analytics (Adobe Inc.) - advanced web analytics

marketing.title: Marketing and advertising services:
marketing.googleAds: Google Ads (Google LLC) - contextual advertising and retargeting
marketing.fbPixel: Facebook Pixel (Meta Platforms Inc.) - conversion tracking
marketing.linkedinTag: LinkedIn Insight Tag (Microsoft Corporation) - audience analysis
marketing.googleMarketing: Google Marketing Platform (Google LLC) - campaign management

technical.title: Technical and infrastructure services:
technical.gtm: Google Tag Manager (Google LLC) - tag management
technical.newRelic: New Relic (New Relic Inc.) - application performance
technical.fontAwesome: Font Awesome (Fonticons Inc.) - icons and graphics
technical.workspace: Google Workspace (Google LLC) - email and documents

crm.title: Content management and CRM services:
crm.hubspot: HubSpot (HubSpot Inc.) - CRM and marketing automation
crm.typeform: Typeform (Typeform SL) - online forms and surveys

medical.title: Medical specialized services:
medical.ehr: Electronic Health Records systems - electronic medical records systems
medical.imaging: Medical imaging platforms - medical imaging platforms
medical.billing: Medical billing services - medical billing services

consent.title: Consent management and compliance:
consent.iubenda: iubenda (iubenda s.r.l.) - legal solutions for websites

internationalTransfer.title: INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFER
internationalTransfer.content: Please note that many of the listed services may store and process data outside Israel, including the USA, EU countries, and other jurisdictions. We ensure protection of your data through:
internationalTransfer.item1: Standard contractual clauses of the EU
internationalTransfer.item2: Certificates of compliance with international standards

consentManagement.title: CONSENT MANAGEMENT
consentManagement.content: You can change your preferences regarding the use of cookies and tracking at any time through the control panel on our website or directly in your browser settings.

cookies.title: COOKIES AND TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES
cookies.control: You can manage cookie settings through the control panel on our website.

security.title: DATA SECURITY
security.intro: We apply comprehensive security measures to protect your data:

organizational.title: Organizational measures:
organizational.item2: Restricting access to medical records on a 'need to know' basis

medical.title: Medical confidentiality:
medical.content: Medical records are protected in accordance with Israeli Patient Rights Law, medical ethics, and internal confidentiality protocols.

retention.title: DATA RETENTION PERIODS
retention.intro: We retain your data only for the necessary period:

medical.title: Medical records:
medical.item1: 7 years from the date of last visit (Israeli legal requirement)

personal.title: Personal data:
personal.item1: Until consent withdrawal or 3 years of inactivity

rights.title: YOUR RIGHTS
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR and Israeli legislation, you have the right to:

basic.title: Basic rights:
basic.item1: Right to access — obtain a copy of your data
basic.item2: Right to rectification — update inaccurate data
basic.item3: Right to erasure — request data deletion ('right to be forgotten')
basic.item4: Right to portability — receive data in machine-readable format

additional.title: Additional rights:
additional.item1: Right to restriction of processing — temporarily suspend processing
additional.item2: Right to object — to processing for marketing
additional.item3: Right to withdraw consent — at any time without consequences
additional.item4: Right to human intervention — in automated decision-making

procedure.title: Rights exercise procedure:
procedure.content: To exercise your rights, contact our Data Protection Officer (contact details below). We will respond within 30 days.

changes.title: POLICY CHANGES
changes.intro: We may update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of significant changes through:
changes.effective: Changes take effect 30 days after publication.

legal.title: LEGAL INFORMATION
legal.content: This Policy is governed by the laws of the State of Israel. All disputes are subject to resolution in Israeli courts.
